mapper.select: SELECT brandtype.id typeId, watertype.id, watertype.type, brandtype.categoryId, waterbrand.brandName, waterbrand.imgUrl FROM watertype LEFT JOIN brandtype ON watertype.id = brandtype.typeId LEFT JOIN waterbrand ON waterbrand.id = brandtype.brandId ORDER BY watertype.id, brandtype.categoryId
SELECT id, type FROM watertype ORDER BY id

SELECT concat( brandtype.id, '' ) typeId, concat( watertype.id, '' ) id, watertype.type, concat( brandtype.categoryId, '' ) categoryId, waterbrand.brandName, waterbrand.imgUrl, concat( waterinfo.id, '' ) waterId, waterinfo.NAME waterName FROM watertype LEFT JOIN brandtype ON watertype.id = brandtype.typeId LEFT JOIN waterbrand ON waterbrand.id = brandtype.brandId LEFT JOIN waterinfo ON waterinfo.waterType = brandtype.id WHERE waterinfo.id IS NOT NULL
AND ( waterbrand.brandName LIKE CONCAT( '%', #{value}, '%' ) OR waterinfo.NAME LIKE CONCAT( '%', #{value}, '%' ) OR watertype.type LIKE CONCAT( '%', #{value}, '%' ) )
